segments.text: I can hardly believe the chaos that's happening in this serene kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks so determined, but it's so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are like beacons of temptation, drawing him in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the woman just keeps polishing that plate, oblivious to the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what would happen if she suddenly turned around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Would she scold them, or simply laugh at the absurdity of it all?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me wants the children to get away with it, to enjoy the thrill.
segments.speaker: PAR
